role.argrole: thing looked at (usually marked by على)

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-TPC-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM الذاهبون)) (PP (PREP الي) (NP (PRON_3MS ه)))) (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يحرصون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN معنى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حضور) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))))) (NP-ADV (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_ACC اكثر)) (PP (PREP من) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN حرص) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الصورة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN التذكارية)))))))) (PUNC .))
